trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_SEQ_00<tab>Qhoterl Pasol wants to bring a touch of style to some otherwise drab textiles.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid purple pigment in the Blind Forest of Yx'Maja)) ((Deliver the splendid purple pigment to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid turmeric in the Blind Forest of Yx'Maja)) ((Deliver the splendid turmeric to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch a splendid spiralshell in south Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the splendid spiralshell to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>We Qitari are experts at weaving clothes, bags, and so on, which we decorate in the traditional manner using various colors.
TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>But with so many of us preoccupied with excavating the caves, we've had little time to gather the raw ingredients for producing the dyes we need.
TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>Were an altruistic volunteer to bring me a small quantity of purple pigment, I think a reward of some sort would be in order.
TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_020<tab>Were an altruistic volunteer to bring me a small quantity of turmeric, I think a reward of some sort would be in order.

TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030<tab>Were an altruistic volunteer to bring me a spiralshell, I think a reward of some sort would be in order. And were said volunteer to use fruit worms as bait, I'm sure they'd snag one in a jiffy!

TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_040<tab>The Blind Forest of Yx'Maja would be an excellent place to begin your search, but watch out for beasties, especially those tarichuks. Oh, I can't stand them!

TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_050<tab>The Blind Forest of Yx'Maja would be an excellent place to begin your search, but watch out for beasties, especially those tarichuks. Oh, I can't stand them!
TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_060<tab>The southern part of Mjrl's Regret is where you're most likely to find one, but don't let those caracals catch you by surprise!
TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_070<tab>Do you have something for me, by any chance? I'm <var 1A 02 /var>dye<var 1A 01 /var>-ing to see it! <snort>

TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_081<tab>With this, we'll be able to bring a touch of Ronkan elegance to our textiles. The patterns with which we adorn ourselves come from their ancient culture, you see.
TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_082<tab>Those that feature a pair of straight, parallel lines represent harmony, whereas spirals are a symbol of the never-ending cycle of nature, for example.
TEXT_BANQIQ111_03816_QHOTERLPASOL_000_083<tab>Perhaps you would consider wearing some of our traditional garments yourself? I think you'd look rather fetching in one of our hats!
